name: query_licencias
description: Query licenses with specific filters based on transaction dates and geographical parameters.

operation.description: One or more works separated by '|'

promotor.description: One or more promotors separated by '|'

residentialtypology.description: One or more residential types separated by '|'. Possible values: `Only Apartments`, `Only Houses`, `Only VPO`, `Apartments & VPO`, `Apartments & Houses`, `Non-Resi`, `Hotel`, `Houses & VPO`, `Apartments & Houses & VPO`
